Description

Latest Central Government Jobs for Engineering Degree holders have been published by Bharat Petroleum Corporation Limited for Apprentice vacancies in Bihar. If you are searching for a government job in Bihar then it is an opportunity for you. You can fill the online application for the vacancies of Apprentice, from 05-07-2021, and till 20-07-2021. If you are interested in all these vacancies in location and if eligible, please check out the details given below, which have been given age limit, educational qualification pay scale, etc.

Application fee:

  • The mode of application is Online
  • No information about the application fee

Educational qualification:

  • To apply for an Apprentice in BPCL, your Engineering Degree  must be completed from a recognized University

Important dates:

  •  The starting date to apply in these posts is 05-07-2021
  •  The last date to apply in these posts is 20-07-2021

Age Limit Criteria:

  • For General Candidate, you should be between 21 to 35 years old. 

BPCL Apprentice Pay Scale:

  • According to the information given by the Central Government and as per the 7th pay commission, the teacher's monthly salary is as per norms

How to apply for BPCL Apprentice Recruitment 2021?

Press the Apply Now button above. You can directly and easily start the application process of the Apprentice. Fill in your details and submit it or follow all the steps given below.

  •  First, go to the official website of BPCL and register yourself on the portal.
  • Find the notification, log in and then provide the details and documents asked by BPCL
  • Then save it and complete the application submission.
  • Then to fully complete the process you have to submit the application fee.
  • And finally, download the application form for future purposes.
